@anonymous_never-watchhentai my character list is on every single Itaiamai summary I have in my pastebin. Just click the latest one and it's literally the first thing you get to read. Anyway, sorry for assuming your English proficiency. Your questions are oftentimes a bit hard to understand so that gave me an impression that you don't speak much English. Also, I don't think I am in any position to say anything about your choice to not read this doujin yet but tbh, I don't think you have much to lose at this point if you just read it anyway. You've probably been checking on this series more often than an average reader would and you seem to be very interested in the story anyway. So might as well read the whole thing, understand the story better, and join the discussions with it. Like, I don't mind answering your questions every time, but the easiest and fastest way for you to get your answers is to just read the story. But yeah, you do you.

@anonymous_never-watchhentai You seem to be having hard time digesting things here and there about this topic, so just to be sure that you fully get what Ive been telling you, I made this for you. CHECK THIS OUT: https://imgur.com/a/vR1ohd5 I highly suggest that you read the whole story again from Ch1. @anonymous_never-watchhentai Mami's last name is Kaminushi.  You would already know this if you're reading my characters list btw. Suma-Sensei calls her by her last name but his boyfriend calls her Mami. Karin has two friends: the one is Anna, the blackhaired girl with a mole under her left eye, and the other is Heika, a tall shorthaired big boobed girl who we often see wearing a Jason mask.

@anonymous_never-watchhentai I think you're confusing a lot of stuff here. Anna's last name is Haruno. Some people call her by her last name, some by first name. I just use her first name in my summary since we don't know Heika's last name yet and they appear together very often. You can check all of the characters' full names by reading my character list. I also think you're confusing Anna with Mami simply because they both have black hair. You can distinguish one from the other by looking at their faces. Anna has a mole under her left eye, Mami doesn't. Page 12 shows both of them in one page and I assume you also misunderstood what's happening here since you thought they're just one person. I explained this scene a bit in the afterword of my summary so feel free to check it out.
Also the girl from chapter 6 is called haruno but haruno what

@jeonsann Hey cmon dude. I don't think you're stupid or anything like that. All you did was just give an impression that you don't like this work since you kept ranting about it whenever you feel like it. And so I simply find it incomprehensible that you're still devotedly reading every new chapter (and even go as far as checking out the raws) despite your dislike for it. Tbh, many people do this so I ain't singling you out here. I just so happen to notice how consistent your ranting is for this series. My intention isn't to stop you from sharing your thoughts and theories for this doujin. In fact, now that it seems like you don't necessarily dislike this series (correct me if Im wrong), the best takeaway from what Im saying here is to be more aware of how your words paint an image of yourself from now on. Shutting up is definitely an option but just being careful is more than enough if done right.
@drinksanddame Thanks for the input. I guess I'm too stupid and annoying for people here. I'll stop commenting and keep it to myself.

@jeonsann excuse me for being rude but you consistently reading this series monthly only to never skip on ranting about it is what I think is beyond comprehension. Like, I get it if you actually like this series but youre just the type of guy who only focuses on the negatives when commenting. But in case that you don't like this work at all, dropping this is definitely the most comprehensible action to take. Otherwise, then the conclusion here would be that people just normally do things that are incomprehensible, so maybe you know, Karin probably just did that there too.

If not Karin will agree to Kise then making excuses like "having sex with him doesn't make my heart race, so its no cheating" same excuse when Kise kiss and grope her boob and he tell sensei about it lol.

@jeonsann today was a big exception because normally Karin would go to Sensei's place to fuck in the morning but she couldn't today. Added by the fact that another guy touched his lips, she was yearning for Sensei harder than usual so they risked getting caught there. Or at least, that's how Im seeing it. I hope I managed to deliver my point well. As for the groping, it's already clear that she mistook it to have come from Sensei. She told sensei about it but he assumed that she was simply referring to the holding hands. Nevertheless in her mind, she has it confirmed that it was Sensei who groped her thus, she has no reason to get mad at it.

@jeonsann not sure if this would make it somewhere within your comprehension but from how I look at it, if Tsutsumi hadn't been there to catch them that close to each other, it could likely be that she wouldve reacted more about that kiss. Of course, that doesn't change the fact that she didn't think of that kiss as anything other than an accident. But since Tsutsumi walked into them, making a big scene about it would definitely cause trouble for sensei which back in the previous chapter, she kinda sweared to avoid. They still have illicit relationship as a secret, so their agreed consensus was to lay low. --

If this turns into NTR I'll just stop reading. I'm not really that invested to be mad enough if it does but I feel like it'll be waste because it's kinda interesting to see the mc working thru his insecurities and seeing the fl in positions wondering if something is actually happening. If it's NTR it'll just be another generic NTR hentai but if not there's potential to dive deeper into his mind but this is a hentai so I'm not expecting much.
And I can't stress this enough, the fact that Karin didn't even get mad at Kise for groping and kissing her is beyond my comprehension
Ohhhhh, so we are going towards the blackmail/ntr route. The kid is gonna use this as a way to fuck her now by threatening to expose her relationship with the sensei.

@xevry Oh now that you mentioned it, iirc a trap character was shown very late into the story but was already mentioned a bit in previous chapters. I don't know how to feel about that tbh. I feel like he wasn't really that relevant to the story esp since he literally only had like 2-3 chapters of screentime, not that Hinamix was really much of a plot-driven work in the first place. So it's hard to say that a similar plot twist would happen to Tsutsumi. Also, Ryohzoh started Hinamix around 6 years ago but his next work after that, Rarefure, didn't feature anything like it. But yeah, who knows. I personally can't see it happening here but I could be wrong.

@DrinksandDame Makes sense, but the reason I brought it up is because Ryoh-zoh has actually done it once before. His other work "Hinamix" has a running mystery throughout the entire series about what happened to "Kawashita-san." Everyone talks about her as a girl and 1 of the male characters had a huge crush on her. In the last chapter, she shows up, and reveals herself as a boy. And I bought the chapter on DLsite for $1.50. Idk how to export the images though from DLsite, otherwise I’d upload the chapter myself.

@xevry I wouldn't really expect that to happen unfortunately. In general, I don't think I've seen any works that introduce an androgenous character, establish the gender to the readers, then reveal later on that it's actually the opposite. I think it's pretty much established that he's a guy since Kise sees him as a rival, and similarly Anna also once suspected him of trying to go for Karin back in Chapter 9. Unless their school allows girls to wear male uniform regularly and the author goes to deliberately provide us that info, I just don't think it's possible. Similar to gacha as in, the percentage to get that unit is low but we still try to roll hoping to get it. In ntr, to get good ending is also low but we still read it anyway, still some authors do make different version of their stories to please both sides. For authors, ntr and drama is probably the easiest cash cow with shitty logic. Look at domestic kanojo, Nisekoi etc. It's popular mainstream obviously gonna be popular in hentai too like Karami Zakari.

@Fix your website, lazy admin Oh I can give you some neat insight as a weirdo who likes both NTR and vanilla equally.  I like NTR cause I am a bitter loser in RL who did actually get NTR'd for real. My bitterness at that made desire the same pain upon others, so for some reason I latched onto cheating type porn as a silly way of imaginary "revenge". It is dumb yeah.

I have a hypothesis as to why people like NTR. Just like when you play horror movies or watch tense movies, it makes you feel something you just can't experience anywhere else. Being scared isn't funny but we watch and play horror movies and games anyway for what they make us feel. Then why not read NTR, which is essentially the NSFW version of young girls' favorite romance stories? I rest my case.
